mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RNUM, TB.* FROM ( select a.BASIC_CODE as basicCode, a.BASIC_GROUP_NM as basicGroupNm, a.BASIC_GROUP_CNT basicGroupCnt, a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as lastUpdtPnttm, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId from TB_BRODBASICGROUP a where 1 = 1
and a.BASIC_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{BASIC_CODE} || '%'
and a.BASIC_GROUP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{basicGroupNm} || '%'
ORDER BY a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM desc ) TB ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

select a.BASIC_CODE as basicCode, a.BASIC_GROUP_NM as basicGroupNm, a.BASIC_GROUP_CNT basicGroupCnt, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as frstRegistPnttm, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as lastUpdtPnttm, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId from TB_BRODBASICGROUP a where a.BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode}

select NVL(count(*), 0) from TB_BRODBASICGROUP a where 1 = 1
and a.BASIC_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{BASIC_CODE} || '%'
and a.BASIC_GROUP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{basicGroupNm} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BRODBASICGROUP(BASIC_CODE, BASIC_GROUP_NM, BASIC_GROUP_CNT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) values (FN_BASICCODE, #{basicGroupNm}, 0, sysdate, #{frstRegisterId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{frstRegisterId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TB_BRODBASICGROUP set BASIC_GROUP_CNT = (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TB_BASICSCHEDULE b WHERE b.CREATE_CHECK = 'Y' AND b.BASIC_CODE = TB_BRODBASICGROUP.BASIC_CODE)
update TB_BRODBASICGROUP set BASIC_GROUP_CNT = BASIC_GROUP_CNT + 1 where BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode}
update TB_BRODBASICGROUP set BASIC_GROUP_CNT = BASIC_GROUP_CNT - 1 where BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode}
